18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetSortedList
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorresult
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorchildren
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorresult
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetSortedList
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorDepthFirstTraversal
18648733Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, List<Node>> children = null; Di2015NewLineList<Node> result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void GetSortedList()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ie = data;Di2015NewLine    children = new Dictionary<string,List<Node>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // construct the dictionary Di2015NewLine    foreach (var n in ie) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!children.ContainsKey(n.ParentId)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            children[n.ParentId] =  new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        children[n.ParentId].Add(n);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Depth first traversalDi2015NewLine    result = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    DepthFirstTraversal("", 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (result.Count() !=  ie.Count()) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If there are cycles, some nodes cannot be reached from the root,Di2015NewLine        // and therefore will not be contained in the result. Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Original list of nodes contains cycles");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DepthFirstTraversal(string parentId, int depth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (children.ContainsKey(parentId))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in children[parentId])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child.Depth = depth;Di2015NewLine            result.Add(child);Di2015NewLine            DepthFirstTraversal(child.Id, depth + 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18648835Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected static List<List<T>> GroupCurveSegments<T>(List<T> dbpoints, LatLngPoint start, LatLngPoint end) where T : BBIDataPointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var withDistances = dbpoints.Select(p => newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ToStart = p.Distance(start),Di2015NewLine        ToEnd = p.Distance(end),Di2015NewLine        DataPoint = pDi2015NewLine    }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var minToStart = withDistances.Min(p => p.ToStart) + 10;Di2015NewLine    var minToEnd = withDistances.Min(p => p.ToEnd) + 10;Di2015NewLine    bool startFound = false, Di2015NewLine        endFound = false, Di2015NewLine        oldStartFound = false, Di2015NewLine        oldEndFound = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var set = new List<List<T>>();Di2015NewLine    var cur = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var a in withDistances)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // save the previous values, because theyDi2015NewLine        // impact the future values.Di2015NewLine        oldStartFound = startFound;Di2015NewLine        oldEndFound = endFound;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        startFound =Di2015NewLine            !oldStartFound && a.ToStart <= minToStartDi2015NewLine            || oldStartFound && !oldEndFoundDi2015NewLine            || oldStartFound && oldEndFoundDi2015NewLine                && (a.ToStart <= minToStart || a.ToEnd <= minToEnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        endFound =Di2015NewLine            !oldEndFound && a.ToEnd <= minToEndDi2015NewLine            || !oldStartFound && oldEndFoundDi2015NewLine            || oldStartFound && oldEndFound Di2015NewLine                && (a.ToStart <= minToStart || a.ToEnd <= minToEnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (startFound || endFound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cur.Add(a.DataPoint);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (cur.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            set.Add(cur);Di2015NewLine            cur = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if a data stream ended near the end of the curve,Di2015NewLine    // then the loop will not have saved it the pass.Di2015NewLine    if (cur.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cur = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return set;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18649357Di2015UniqueSeparator// NOTE: The iteration count shouldDi2015NewLine// be as high as possible without causingDi2015NewLine// unreasonable delay.  Note also that the passwordDi2015NewLine// and salt are byte arrays, not strings.  After use,Di2015NewLine// the password and salt should be cleared (with Array.Clear)Di2015NewLinepublic static byte[] PBKDF2Sha256GetBytes(int dklen, byte[] password, byte[] salt, int iterationCount){Di2015NewLine    using(var hmac=new System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA256(password)){Di2015NewLine        int hashLength=hmac.HashSize/8;Di2015NewLine        if((hmac.HashSize&7)!=0)Di2015NewLine            hashLength++;Di2015NewLine        int keyLength=dklen/hashLength;Di2015NewLine        if((long)dklen>(0xFFFFFFFFL*hashLength) || dklen<0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("dklen");Di2015NewLine        if(dklen%hashLength!=0)Di2015NewLine            keyLength++;Di2015NewLine        byte[] extendedkey=new byte[salt.Length+4];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(salt,0,extendedkey,0,salt.Length);Di2015NewLine        using(var ms=new System.IO.MemoryStream()){Di2015NewLine            for(int i=0;i<keyLength;i++){Di2015NewLine                extendedkey[salt.Length]=(byte)(((i+1)>>24)&0xFF);Di2015NewLine                extendedkey[salt.Length+1]=(byte)(((i+1)>>16)&0xFF);Di2015NewLine                extendedkey[salt.Length+2]=(byte)(((i+1)>>8)&0xFF);Di2015NewLine                extendedkey[salt.Length+3]=(byte)(((i+1))&0xFF);Di2015NewLine                byte[] u=hmac.ComputeHash(extendedkey);Di2015NewLine                Array.Clear(extendedkey,salt.Length,4);Di2015NewLine                byte[] f=u;Di2015NewLine                for(int j=1;j<iterationCount;j++){Di2015NewLine                    u=hmac.ComputeHash(u);Di2015NewLine                    for(int k=0;k<f.Length;k++){Di2015NewLine                        f[k]^=u[k];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ms.Write(f,0,f.Length);Di2015NewLine                Array.Clear(u,0,u.Length);Di2015NewLine                Array.Clear(f,0,f.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            byte[] dk=new byte[dklen];Di2015NewLine            ms.Position=0;Di2015NewLine            ms.Read(dk,0,dklen);Di2015NewLine            ms.Position=0;Di2015NewLine            for(long i=0;i<ms.Length;i++){Di2015NewLine                ms.WriteByte(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Array.Clear(extendedkey,0,extendedkey.Length);Di2015NewLine            return dk;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18649584Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Func<bool> GenerateCheckIsLocal() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dynamicMethod = new DynamicMethod("CheckIsLocal", typeof(bool), Type.EmptyTypes, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var il = dynamicMethod.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, typeof(HttpContext).GetProperty("Current").GetMethod);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, typeof(HttpContext).GetProperty("Request").GetMethod);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Call, typeof(HttpRequest).GetProperty("IsLocal").GetMethod);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return dynamicMethod.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<bool>)) as Func<bool>;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

18651904Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE dbo.StoredProcedure2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @columnName varchar(50),Di2015NewLine    @batchmId  intDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @SQL1 AS VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @SQL2 AS VARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @SQL1 = 'select ' + @columnName + ' from Batch_Master'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @SQL1 = 'select ' + @columnName + 'Di2015NewLine         from GTIN_Master inner join Batch_MasterDi2015NewLine         on GTIN_Master.GTIN = Batch_Master.GTINDi2015NewLine         where Batch_M_id =' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,@batchmId)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.columns WHERE Name = @columnName and Object_ID = Object_ID(N'Batch_Master'))Di2015NewLine        BEGIN    Di2015NewLine            EXEC (@SQL1)Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine    ELSEDi2015NewLine        BEGINDi2015NewLine            EXEC (@SQL2)Di2015NewLine        ENDDi2015NewLine
18651941Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContainsExistsAnyShort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ContainsExistsAny();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ContainsExistsAny()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("***************************************");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("********* ContainsExistsAny ***********");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("***************************************");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> list = new List<int>(6000000);Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 6000000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(random.Next(6000000));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int[] arr = list.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        find(list, arr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ContainsExistsAnyShort()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("***************************************");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("***** ContainsExistsAnyShortRange *****");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("***************************************");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> list = new List<int>(2000);Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 2000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(random.Next(6000000));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int[] arr = list.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        find(list, arr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void find(List<int> list, int[] arr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine        int[] find = new int[10000];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            find[i] = random.Next(6000000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int rpt = 0; rpt < 10000; rpt++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Contains(find[rpt]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("List/Contains: {0}ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int rpt = 0; rpt < 10000; rpt++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Exists(a => a == find[rpt]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("List/Exists: {0}ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int rpt = 0; rpt < 10000; rpt++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Any(a => a == find[rpt]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("List/Any: {0}ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int rpt = 0; rpt < 10000; rpt++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            arr.Contains(find[rpt]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Array/Contains: {0}ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Arrays do not have Exists");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int rpt = 0; rpt < 10000; rpt++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            arr.Any(a => a == find[rpt]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Array/Any: {0}ms", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18654964Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync/await
18654964Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task TimeoutAfter(this Task task, int millisecondsTimeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Short-circuit #1: infinite timeout or task already completedDi2015NewLine    if (task.IsCompleted || (millisecondsTimeout == Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Either the task has already completed or timeout will never occur.Di2015NewLine        // No proxy necessary.Di2015NewLine        return task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // tcs.Task will be returned as a proxy to the callerDi2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<VoidTypeStruct> tcs = Di2015NewLine        new TaskCompletionSource<VoidTypeStruct>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Short-circuit #2: zero timeoutDi2015NewLine    if (millisecondsTimeout == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // We've already timed out.Di2015NewLine        tcs.SetException(new TimeoutException());Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set up a timer to complete after the specified timeout periodDi2015NewLine    Timer timer = new Timer(state => Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Recover your state informationDi2015NewLine        var myTcs = (TaskCompletionSource<VoidTypeStruct>)state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Fault our proxy with a TimeoutExceptionDi2015NewLine        myTcs.TrySetException(new TimeoutException()); Di2015NewLine    }, tcs, millisecondsTimeout, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Wire up the logic for what happens when source task completesDi2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith((antecedent, state) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Recover our state dataDi2015NewLine        var tuple = Di2015NewLine            (Tuple<Timer, TaskCompletionSource<VoidTypeStruct>>)state;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Cancel the TimerDi2015NewLine        tuple.Item1.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Marshal results to proxyDi2015NewLine        MarshalTaskResults(antecedent, tuple.Item2);Di2015NewLine    }, Di2015NewLine    Tuple.Create(timer, tcs),Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken.None,Di2015NewLine    TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously,Di2015NewLine    TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18654964Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static async Task TimeoutAfter(this Task task, int millisecondsTimeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (task == await Task.WhenAny(task, Task.Delay(millisecondsTimeout))) Di2015NewLine        await task;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        throw new TimeoutException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18656415Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring temp = s;Di2015NewLine        string tempResult = "";Di2015NewLine        bool found = false;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                tempResult = "";Di2015NewLine                found = false;Di2015NewLine                if (s.Length < lenght) return s;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Examine every word to cut everything into wordsDi2015NewLine                    string[] tempList = temp.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string temp2 in tempList)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Check every word length now,Di2015NewLine                        if (temp2.Length > lenght)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            tempResult = tempResult + " " + temp2.Substring(0, lenght - 3) + "- " + temp2.Substring(lenght -3);Di2015NewLine                            found = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                            tempResult = tempResult + " " + temp2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (found) temp = tempResult;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (found);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tempResult.TrimStart();Di2015NewLine

18659784Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar countries = result.Select(x => x.countryid).Distinct();Di2015NewLinevar years = result.SelectMany(x => x.data).Select(x => x.year).Distinct();Di2015NewLinevar data = result.SelectMany(x => x.dataDi2015NewLine                                   .Select(y => new { Country = x.countryid,Di2015NewLine                                                      Data = y }))Di2015NewLine                 .ToDictionary(x => Tuple.Create(x.Country, x.Data.year),Di2015NewLine                               x => x.Data.value);   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar pivot = (from c in countriesDi2015NewLine             from y in yearsDi2015NewLine             select new { Country = c, Year = y, Value = GetValue(c, y, data) })Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(x => x.Year)Di2015NewLine            .OrderBy(x => x.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic float? 18659866Di2015UniqueSeparatorIComparer<string>
18659866Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass VersionComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(string a, string b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // omitted error checking for brevityDi2015NewLine        var sa = a.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        var majorA = sa[0];Di2015NewLine        var minorA = sa[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sb = b.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        var majorB = sb[0];Di2015NewLine        var minorB = sb[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(majorA == majorB)Di2015NewLine            return minorA.CompareTo(minorB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return majorA.CompareTo(majorB); // assuming a single letter of always the same caseDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18659866Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar comparer = new VersionComparer();Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(comparer.Compare("2.C", "2.D") < 0);  // 2.C is olderDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(comparer.Compare("2.D", "2.D") == 0); // sameDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(comparer.Compare("2.E", "2.D") > 0);  // 2.E is newerDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(comparer.Compare("3.C", "2.D") > 0);  // 3.C is newerDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(comparer.Compare("0.A", "0.B") < 0);  // 0.A is olderDi2015NewLine
18659866Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass VersionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Major {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public string Minor {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Version(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // omitted error checking for brevityDi2015NewLine        // assuming a single letter of always the same caseDi2015NewLine        var sa = s.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        Major = int.Parse(sa[0]);Di2015NewLine        Minor = sa[1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator <(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (one.Major == another.Major)Di2015NewLine            return one.Minor.CompareTo(another.Minor) < 0;Di2015NewLine        return one.Major< another.Major;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator >(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !(one < another);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return one.Major == another.Major && one.Minor == another.Minor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !(one == another);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator >=(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (one > another || one == another);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator <=(Version one, Version another)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (one < another || one == another);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18659866Di2015UniqueSeparatorDebug.Assert(new Version("2.C")  < new Version("2.D"));Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(new Version("2.D")  > new Version("2.C"));Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(new Version("4.C")  > new Version("2.D"));Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(new Version("4.C")  == new Version("4.C"));Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(new Version("4.C")  >= new Version("2.D"));Di2015NewLine

18659940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> Select<TSource, TResult>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, int, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (selector == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("selector");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Enumerable.SelectIterator<TSource, TResult>(source, selector);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<TResult> SelectIterator<TSource, TResult>(IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, int, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int num = -1;Di2015NewLine    checkedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (TSource current in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            num++;Di2015NewLine            yield return selector(current, num);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18660977Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<Control> FlattenControlTree<TFilterType>(Control control)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (control is TFilterType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return control;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control contr in control.Controls.Cast<Control>().SelectMany((c) => FlattenControlTree<TFilterType>(c)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (contr is TFilterType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return contr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18661139Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string GetDestinationPath(Type source, Type destination, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetDestinationPath(source, destination, propertyName, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetDestinationPath(Type source, Type destination, string propertyName, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var typeMap = Mapper.FindTypeMapFor(source, destination);Di2015NewLine        if (typeMap == null)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        var maps = typeMap.GetPropertyMaps();Di2015NewLine        var exactMatch = maps.FirstOrDefault(m => m.SourceMember != null && m.SourceMember.Name == propertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (exactMatch != null)Di2015NewLine            return path + exactMatch.DestinationProperty.Name;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var map in maps)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (map.SourceMember == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = GetDestinationPath(source, map.DestinationProperty.MemberType, propertyName, path + map.DestinationProperty.Name + ".");Di2015NewLine                if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!(map.SourceMember is PropertyInfo))Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                var result = GetDestinationPath((map.SourceMember as PropertyInfo).PropertyType, map.DestinationProperty.MemberType, propertyName, path + map.DestinationProperty.Name);Di2015NewLine                if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18664122Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic T GetNestedException<T>(Exception ex) where T : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (ex == null) { return null; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tEx = ex as T;Di2015NewLine    if (tEx != null) { return tEx; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return GetNestedException<T>(ex.InnerException);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18664122Di2015UniqueSeparatorcatch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var wex = GetNestedException<WebException>(ex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If there is no nested WebException, re-throw the exception.Di2015NewLine    if (wex == null) { throw; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the response object.Di2015NewLine    var response = wex.Response as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If it's not an HTTP response or is not error 403, re-throw.Di2015NewLine    if (response == null || response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.Forbidden) {Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The error is 403.  Handle it here.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18667730Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string> _boxAndFileList = new List<string> { "12345678", "123456789", "1234", "123456778" };Di2015NewLinepublic void PopulateItemsList()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //clear the listDi2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine    //add the labels to the top of the listboxDi2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.Columns.Add("Boxes");Di2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.Columns.Add("Files");Di2015NewLine    //set the view of the list to a details view (important if you try to display images)Di2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.View = View.Details;Di2015NewLine    //clear scan id boxDi2015NewLine    ScanIdBox.Text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get all the items whos length are 8 as well as a unique id (index)Di2015NewLine    var boxes = _boxAndFileList.Where(b => b.Length == 8).Select((b, index) => new { index, b }).ToList();Di2015NewLine    //get all the items whos length are NOT 8 as well as a unique id (index)Di2015NewLine    var files = _boxAndFileList.Where(f => f.Length != 8).Select((f, index) => new { index, f }).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //join them together on their unique ids so that you get info on both sides.Di2015NewLine    var interim = (from f in filesDi2015NewLine                   join b in boxes on f.index equals b.index into bfDi2015NewLine                   from x in bf.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                   select new { box = (x == null ? String.Empty : x.b), file = f.f });Di2015NewLine    //the real trick here is that you have to add Di2015NewLine    //to the listviewitem of type string[] in order to populate the second, third, or more column.Di2015NewLine    //I'm just doing this in linq, but var x = new ListViewItem(new[]{"myBox", "myFile"}) would work the sameDi2015NewLine    var fileboxes = interim.Select(x => new ListViewItem(new []{ x.box, x.file})).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    //add the array to the listboxDi2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.Items.AddRange(fileboxes);Di2015NewLine    //refresh the listboxDi2015NewLine    BoxAndFileList.Refresh();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18667890Di2015UniqueSeparatorint window = (buffer.Length / maxWidth) + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < buffer.Length; x += window)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double min = double.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    double max = double.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < window; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = x + j;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index < buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double value = buffer[x+j];Di2015NewLine            if (value < min)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                min = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (value > max)Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                max = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.Add(x, min);Di2015NewLine    list.Add(x + (window - 1), max);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18669492Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass IPAddressConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (objectType == typeof(IPAddress));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress ip = (IPAddress)value;Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteValue(ip.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JToken token = JToken.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        return IPAddress.Parse(token.Value<string>());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18669492Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPEndPoint
18669492Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPEndPoint
18669492Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass IPEndPointConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (objectType == typeof(IPEndPoint));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPEndPoint ep = (IPEndPoint)value;Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLine        writer.WritePropertyName("Address");Di2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize(writer, ep.Address);Di2015NewLine        writer.WritePropertyName("Port");Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteValue(ep.Port);Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        JObject jo = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        IPAddress address = jo["Address"].ToObject<IPAddress>(serializer);Di2015NewLine        int port = jo["Port"].Value<int>();Di2015NewLine        return new IPEndPoint(address, port);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18670481Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FrameworkElementExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static object TryFindResource(this FrameworkElement element, object resourceKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentElement = element;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (currentElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var resource = currentElement.Resources[resourceKey];Di2015NewLine            if (resource != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return resource;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currentElement = currentElement.Parent as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Application.Current.Resources[resourceKey];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/**********************************************************************/Di2015NewLine// Or, the recursive version of TryFindResource method as suggested by @Default:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object TryFindResource(this FrameworkElement element, object resourceKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (element == null)Di2015NewLine        return Application.Current.Resources[resourceKey];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var resource = element.Resources[resourceKey];Di2015NewLine    if (resource != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return resource;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return TryFindResource(element.Parent, resourceKey);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18673657Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandomize
18673657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T[] Randomize<T>(T[] source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> randomized = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    List<T> original = new List<T>(source);Di2015NewLine    Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int size = original.Count; size > 0; size--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = r.Next(size);Di2015NewLine        randomized.Add(original[index]);Di2015NewLine        original[index] = original[size - 1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return randomized.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18674492Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.CompilerServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class ConditionalHashSet<T> where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object locker = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<WeakReference> weakList = new List<WeakReference>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConditionalWeakTable<T, WeakReference> weakDictionary =Di2015NewLine        new ConditionalWeakTable<T, WeakReference>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this.locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var reference = new WeakReference(item);Di2015NewLine            this.weakDictionary.Add(item, reference);Di2015NewLine            this.weakList.Add(reference);Di2015NewLine            this.Shrink();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Remove(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this.locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WeakReference reference;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.weakDictionary.TryGetValue(item, out reference))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reference.Target = null;Di2015NewLine                this.weakDictionary.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T[] ToArray()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this.locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Di2015NewLine                from weakReference in this.weakListDi2015NewLine                let item = (T)weakReference.TargetDi2015NewLine                where item != nullDi2015NewLine                select item)Di2015NewLine                .ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Shrink()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This method prevents the List<T> from growing indefinitely, but Di2015NewLine        // might also cause  a performance problem in some cases.Di2015NewLine        if (this.weakList.Capacity == this.weakList.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.weakList.RemoveAll(weak => !weak.IsAlive);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18675489Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IList<PropertyInfo> GetProperties<T>(Expression<Func<T, object>> fullExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Expression expression;Di2015NewLine    switch (fullExpression.Body.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.ConvertChecked:Di2015NewLine            var ue = fullExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            expression = ((ue != null) ? ue.Operand : null) as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            expression = fullExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var props = new List<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(expression != null && expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExp = expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(memberExp.Member is FieldInfo)Di2015NewLine            throw InvalidExpressionException.FieldFound;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var prop = memberExp.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine        props.Insert(0, prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        expression = memberExp.Expression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return props;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18675744Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Number of Layers ? ");Di2015NewLine            int input0 = 0;Di2015NewLine            bool right0 = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input0);Di2015NewLine            if (right0 && input0 > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int tot_layers = input0;Di2015NewLine                int[] maxDiamLayer = new int[tot_layers + 1]; //better maintain the indexing as displayed to the user: starting from 1Di2015NewLine                bool[] layerDone = new bool[tot_layers + 1]; //This boolean array will make sure that you don't use the same layer more than onceDi2015NewLine                int disk_number = 0;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i <= tot_layers; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write("\\nIntroduce the maximum diameter for the layer num {0} : ", i);Di2015NewLine                    maxDiamLayer[i] = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.Write("\\nPress 1 to Insert disk? ");Di2015NewLine                input0 = 0;Di2015NewLine                right0 = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (right0 && input0 == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.Write("\\nDiameter of Disk? ");Di2015NewLine                    int input = 0;Di2015NewLine                    bool right = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input);Di2015NewLine                    if (!right || input <= 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("\\nWrong Diameter. ");Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    int disk_diameter = input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bool oneInserted = false;Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 1; i <= tot_layers; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (disk_diameter <= maxDiamLayer[i] && !layerDone[i])Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            layerDone[i] = true;Di2015NewLine                            oneInserted = true;Di2015NewLine                            disk_number++;Di2015NewLine                            Console.Write("\\nNumber of disks contained in container are : {0}", disk_number);Di2015NewLine                            Console.Write("\\nPress 1 to Insert more disk(s)? ");Di2015NewLine                            int input2 = 0;Di2015NewLine                            bool right2 = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input2);Di2015NewLine                            if (!right2 || input2 != 1 || disk_number >= tot_layers) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            Console.Write("\\nDiameter of Disk? ");Di2015NewLine                            input = 0;Di2015NewLine                            right = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input);Di2015NewLine                            if (!right || input <= 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Console.Write("\\nWrong Diameter. ");Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            disk_diameter = input;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (disk_number >= tot_layers)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("\\nAll the layers are filled");Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("\\nWrong diameter. Try again.");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!oneInserted)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("\\nThe disk couldn't be inserted");Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("\\nPress 1 to continue ");Di2015NewLine                        int input3 = 0;Di2015NewLine                        bool right3 = int.TryParse(Console.ReadLine(), out input3);Di2015NewLine                        if (!right3 || input3 != 1) break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18675926Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WebUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Task<Image> GetPageAsImageAsync(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<Image>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var thread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebBrowser browser = new WebBrowser();Di2015NewLine            browser.Size = new Size(1280, 768);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventHandler documentCompleted = null;Di2015NewLine            documentCompleted = async (o, s) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                browser.DocumentCompleted -= documentCompleted;Di2015NewLine                await Task.Delay(2000); //Run JS a few seconds moreDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Bitmap bitmap = TakeSnapshot(browser);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetResult(bitmap);Di2015NewLine                browser.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                Application.ExitThread();Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            browser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed = true;Di2015NewLine            browser.DocumentCompleted += documentCompleted;Di2015NewLine            browser.Navigate(url);Di2015NewLine            Application.Run();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        thread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine        thread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Bitmap TakeSnapshot(WebBrowser browser)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         browser.Width = browser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Width;Di2015NewLine         browser.Height= browser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(browser.Width - System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarWidth, browser.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         browser.DrawToBitmap(bitmap, new Rectangle(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return bitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18683272Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<S, IEnumerable<T>>> GroupSeqsBy<T, S>(this IEnumerable<T> list, Func<T, S> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<T> retList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    S prev = keySelector(list.FirstOrDefault());Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (keySelector(item).Equals(prev))Di2015NewLine            retList.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new KeyValuePair<S, IEnumerable<T>>(prev, retList);Di2015NewLine            prev = keySelector(item);Di2015NewLine            retList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            retList.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (retList.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return new KeyValuePair<S, IEnumerable<T>>(prev, retList);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18683922Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<string> GetSubstrings(string toSplit, int maxLength, Graphics graph, Font font)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     List<string> substrings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine     string[] words = toSplit.Split(" ".ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine     string oneSub = "";Di2015NewLine     foreach (string oneWord in words)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        string temp = oneSub + oneWord + " ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (graph.MeasureString( temp, font).Width > maxLength) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           substrings.Add(oneSub);Di2015NewLine           oneSub = oneWord + " ";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine           oneSub = temp;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     substrings.Add(oneSub);Di2015NewLine     return substrings;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18684291Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction _unpack(a) {   // takes a string as argument, we can see that it's a string because strings have the match method, which is used below a.match(...)Di2015NewLine    var x, p = '';      // declare x, declare p and initialize it with the empty string valueDi2015NewLine    p = a.match(/%2/);  // match will return ['%2'] (which is an array that contains the string '%2' at index 0) only if %2 is found in the string 'a', else it returns nullDi2015NewLine    if (p) {            // if p is thruthy (objects are), but null is falsey. It's like saying, if there was a matchDi2015NewLine        x = _uncase(a);Di2015NewLine        return _uncase(x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return _uncase(a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18685853Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int CountSubsets<T>(this IList<T> list, IList<T> subList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var grouped = list.GroupBy(t => t).ToDictionary(t => t.Key, t => t.Count());Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (RemoveSubset(grouped, subList))Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool RemoveSubset<T>(Dictionary<T, int> dict, IList<T> subList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in subList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dict.ContainsKey(item) && dict[item] > 0)Di2015NewLine            dict[item]--;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18685853Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int CountSubsets2<T>(this IList<T> list, IList<T> subList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var main = list.GroupBy(t => t).ToDictionary(t => t.Key, t => t.Count());Di2015NewLine    var sub = subList.GroupBy(t => t).ToDictionary(t => t.Key, t => t.Count());Di2015NewLine    return sub.Select(t => main.ContainsKey(t.Key) ? main[t.Key] / t.Value : 0).Min();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18691805Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring sentence = @"CREATE SEQUENCE 'MY_TEST_SEQUENCE' MINVALUE -8 MAXVALUE 999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 55 CACHE 20 NOORDER NOCYCLE";Di2015NewLinestring pattern = @".*\\s+MINVALUE[ ]*(?<MinValue>[-?\\d]*)[ ]*MAXVALUE[ ]*(?<MaxValue>[\\d]*)";Di2015NewLineRegex rgx = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLineMatch match = rgx.Match(sentence);Di2015NewLineGroup gp1 = match.Groups[1];//-8 or 8 (both valid).Di2015NewLineGroup gp2 = match.Groups[2];//Value after MAXVALUE.Di2015NewLineif (gp1.Value.StartsWith("-") == false)//No minus sign,that must be a positive value.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string s2 = string.Format(@"CREATE SEQUENCE ""MY_TEST_SEQUENCE"" MINVALUE 8 MAXVALUE 999  INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH {0} CACHE 20 NOORDER NOCYCLE", gp1.Value);Di2015NewLine  MessageBox.Show(s2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineelse if (gp1.Value.StartsWith("-") == true)//No need for further checking, a value with - will always be smaller.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string s2 = string.Format(@"CREATE SEQUENCE ""MY_TEST_SEQUENCE"" MINVALUE 8 MAXVALUE 999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH {0} CACHE 20 NOORDER NOCYCLE", gp2.Value);Di2015NewLine  MessageBox.Show(s2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18693361Di2015UniqueSeparatorSuspendFlush()
18693361Di2015UniqueSeparatorResumeFlush()
18693361Di2015UniqueSeparator//Di2015NewLine// Summary:Di2015NewLine// Temporarily suspends eager-flushing (flushing if the write-queue becomesDi2015NewLine// empty briefly). Buffer-based flushing will still occur when the data is full.Di2015NewLine// This is useful if you are performing a large number of operations in closeDi2015NewLine// duration, and want to avoid packet fragmentation. Note that you MUST callDi2015NewLine// ResumeFlush at the end of the operation - preferably using Try/Finally soDi2015NewLine// that flushing is resumed even upon error. This method is thread-safe; anyDi2015NewLine// number of callers can suspend/resume flushing concurrently - eager flushingDi2015NewLine// will resume fully when all callers have called ResumeFlush.Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// Remarks:Di2015NewLine// Note that some operations (transaction conditions, etc) require flushingDi2015NewLine// - this will still occur even if the buffer is only part full.Di2015NewLine

18693779Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DictionaryExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Item GetItem(this Dictionary<string, string> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = dictionary.GetTypeOfItem().ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine        var json = dictionary.ToJson();Di2015NewLine        switch (type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "sword":Di2015NewLine                return GetItem<Weapon>(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case "armor":Di2015NewLine                return GetItem<Armor>(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("dictionary", type, string.Format("Unknown type: {0}", type));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetTypeOfItem(this Dictionary<string, string> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!dictionary.ContainsKey("Type"))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Not valid type!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dictionary["Type"];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string ToJson(this Dictionary<string, string> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var output = new StringBuilder("{");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in dictionary.OrderBy(k => k.Key))Di2015NewLine            output.AppendFormat("\\"{0}\\":\\"{1}\\",", property.Key, property.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.Append("}");Di2015NewLine        return output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Item GetItem<TItem>(string json) where TItem: ItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<TItem>(json);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18697219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ServiceSpecificationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int BytesInWord = 8;Di2015NewLine    public int? In { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int? Out { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ServiceSpecification Parse(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ServiceSpecification {Di2015NewLine            In = ParseBytesCount(s, "In"),Di2015NewLine            Out = ParseBytesCount(s, "Out")Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int? ParseBytesCount(string s, string direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pattern = direction + @"(\\d+)(bytes|words)";Di2015NewLine        var match = Regex.Match(s, pattern);Di2015NewLine        if (!match.Success)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int value = Int32.Parse(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine        return match.Groups[2].Value == "bytes" ? value : value * BytesInWord;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsSatisfiedBy(IService service)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (In.HasValue && service.In != In.Value)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Out.HasValue && service.Out != Out.Value)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<string> BuildNameSpace(IEnumerable<string> @namespace, string parent, List<string> parts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var part = @namespace.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (part == null) return parts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var current = string.Format("{0}.{1}", parent, part);Di2015NewLine IEnumerable<CodeClass> GetSubClasses(string baseClass, Project project)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return VisualStudioHelper       Di2015NewLine        .CodeModelDi2015NewLine        .GetAllCodeElementsOfType(project.CodeModel.CodeElements, EnvDTE.vsCMElement.vsCMElementClass, false)Di2015NewLine        .Cast<CodeClass>()Di2015NewLine        .Where(c => GetInheritance(c).Any(b => b.FullName == baseClass) && !c.IsAbstract)Di2015NewLine        .ToList(); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<CodeClass> GetInheritance(CodeClass @class) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetInheritance(@class, new List<CodeClass>());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<CodeClass> GetInheritance(CodeClass @class, List<CodeClass> collection) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(CodeClass @base in @class.Bases) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        collection.Add(@base);Di2015NewLine        GetInheritance(@base, collection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return collection;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string CamelCased(string pascalCased) {Di2015NewLine    return pascalCased.Substring(0, 1).ToLower() + pascalCased.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<CodeProperty> GetProperties(CodeClass .Cast<CodeElement>()Di2015NewLine        .Where(ce => ce.Kind == vsCMElement.vsCMElementProperty)Di2015NewLine        .Cast<CodeProperty>()Di2015NewLine        .Where(p => p.Access == vsCMAccess.vsCMAccessPublic));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine #>Di2015NewLine

#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Event handlersDi2015NewLine        void AssociatedObject_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch break;Di2015NewLine                case Key.K:Di2015NewLine                    NavigateGridFocus(FocusNavigationDirection.Down);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Key.X:Di2015NewLine                    ToggleRowSelection();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine         var generator = AssociatedObject.ItemContainerGenerator;Di2015NewLine            var rowItem = generator.ItemFromContainer(currentlyFocusedRow);Di2015NewLine            if (AssociatedObject.SelectionMode == DataGridSelectionMode.Extended)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (AssociatedObject.SelectedItems.Contains(rowItem))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AssociatedObject.SelectedItems.Remove(rowItem);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AssociatedObject.SelectedItems.Add(rowItem);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                AssociatedObject.SelectedItem = AssociatedObject.SelectedItem == rowItem ? null : rowItem;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var traversalRequest = new TraversalRequest(direction);Di2015NewLine            var currentlyFocusedElement = Keyboard.FocusedElement as UIElement;Di2015NewLine            if (currentlyFocusedElement != null) 18707692Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable<TProperty> SelectProperty<TEntity, TProperty>(DbContext context, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity));Di2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Property(parameter, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, TProperty>>(body, parameter);Di2015NewLine    var result = context.Set<TEntity>().Select (lambda).Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18707692Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IQueryable SelectProperty<TEntity>(DbContext context, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var entities = context.Set<TEntity>();Di2015NewLine    var query = entities.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine    var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity), "instance");Di2015NewLine    var propertyAccess = Expression.Property(parameter, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var projection = Expression.Lambda(propertyAccess, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var selectExpression = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine        typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                         .First (x => x.Name == "Select")Di2015NewLine                         .MakeGenericMethod(new[]{ typeof(TEntity), propertyAccess.Type }),Di2015NewLine        query.Expression,Di2015NewLine        projection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var distinctExpression = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine        typeof(Queryable).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                         .First (x => x.Name == "Distinct")Di2015NewLine                         .MakeGenericMethod(new[]{ propertyAccess.Type }),Di2015NewLine        selectExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = query.Provider.CreateQuery(distinctExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18707870Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar handler = new ResponseHandler();Di2015NewLinevar handlerClassType = typeof(ResponseHandler); // This is how you get Type object from a type. Unlike, `GetType` on objectsDi2015NewLinevar paramType = Response.Item.GetType();Di2015NewLine// Get me method which is named Handle and takes parameters in parameter arrayDi2015NewLine// handlerMethod will be of type MethodInfo. This is basically a descriptor of aDi2015NewLine// method. Not a pointer to a method or some such...Di2015NewLinevar handlerMethod = handlerClassType.GetMethod("Handle", new Type[] { paramType });Di2015NewLine// Throw exception if we don't know how to handle itDi2015NewLineif (handlerMethod == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Handler not found for received response type");Di2015NewLine// Invoke the handler. 18707896Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable.Zip
18707896Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> ZipAll<T, TResult>(this IEnumerable<T> list1,Di2015NewLine                                                           IEnumerable<T> list2,Di2015NewLine                                                           Func<T, T, TResult> zipper,Di2015NewLine                                                           T defaultValue = default(T))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var enum1 = list1.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var enum2 = list2.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool valid1, valid2;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                valid1 = enum1.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                valid2 = enum2.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                if (valid1 || valid2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var item1 = valid1 ? enum1.Current : defaultValue;Di2015NewLine                    var item2 = valid2 ? enum2.Current : defaultValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    yield return zipper(item1, item2);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (valid1 || valid2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18707896Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar result = list1.ZipAll(list2, (l1, l2) => new { l1, l2 }, string.Empty);Di2015NewLine

18707966Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Type> TypeHierarchy(this Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return type;Di2015NewLine        type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine    } while (type != null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18707966Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Type MostDerivedCommonBase(IEnumerable<Type> types)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!types.Any()) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var counts = new Dictionary<Type, int>();Di2015NewLine    var total = types.Count();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var type in types.SelectMany(t => t.TypeHierarchy()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!counts.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            counts[type] = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            counts[type]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return types.First().TypeHierarchy().First(t => counts[t] == total);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18707966Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar types = new[] { typeof(MemoryStream), typeof(FileStream) };Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(MostDerivedCommonBase(types)); // System.IO.StreamDi2015NewLine
18707966Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Type MostDerivedCommonBase(IEnumerable<Type> types)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!types.Any()) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var counts = types.SelectMany(t => t.TypeHierarchy())Di2015NewLine                      .GroupBy(t => t)Di2015NewLine                      .ToDictionary(g => g.Key, g => g.Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var total = counts[typeof(object)]; // optimization instead of types.Count()Di2015NewLine    return types.First().TypeHierarchy().First(t => counts[t] == total);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18716945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string SplitName(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string forename;Di2015NewLine    string middlename;Di2015NewLine    string surname;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var name = text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (name != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (name.Length > 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            forename = name[0];Di2015NewLine            surname = name[name.Length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            middlename = string.Join(" ", name, 1, name.Length - 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            text = string.Format("{0} {1} {2}", forename, middlename, surname);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        text = "INVALID";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return text;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18717186Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double d = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<double, double>> ex1 = x => -x;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<double>> ex2 = () => -d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result1 = Demungify(ex1); // (x) => -xDi2015NewLine        var result2 = Demungify(ex2); // () => -100Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static LambdaExpression Demungify(LambdaExpression ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new Demungifier();Di2015NewLine        var newBody = visitor.Visit(ex.Body);Di2015NewLine        var args = ex.Parameters.Where(visitor.WasSeen).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(newBody, args);Di2015NewLine        if (!args.Any() && !(lambda.Body is ConstantExpression))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // evaluate that!Di2015NewLine            object result = lambda.Compile().DynamicInvoke();Di2015NewLine            lambda = Expression.Lambda(Expression.Constant(result, newBody.Type));    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lambda;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    class Demungifier : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        readonly HashSet<ParameterExpression> parameters = new HashSet<ParameterExpression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool WasSeen(ParameterExpression param)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return parameters.Contains(param);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters.Add(node);Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object value;Di2015NewLine            if(TryEvaluate(node, out value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Constant(value, ((FieldInfo)node.Member).FieldType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bool TryEvaluate(Expression expression, out object value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(expression == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = null;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = ((ConstantExpression)expression).Value;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // captured variables are always fields, potentially of fields of fieldsDi2015NewLine            // eventually terminating in a ConstantExpression that is the capture-contextDi2015NewLine            MemberExpression member;Di2015NewLine            if(expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccessDi2015NewLine                && (member= (MemberExpression)expression).Member.MemberType == System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object target;Di2015NewLine                if(TryEvaluate(member.Expression, out target))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    value = ((FieldInfo)member.Member).GetValue(target);Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            value = null;Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18717219Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T> Path<T>(IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine                       Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childrenSelector,Di2015NewLine                       Func<T, bool> condition)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var path = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine    Path(source, childrenSelector, condition, path);Di2015NewLine    return path.Reverse().ToList();Di2015NewLine}                       Di2015NewLinebool Path<T>(IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine             Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childrenSelector,Di2015NewLine             Func<T, bool> condition,Di2015NewLine             Stack<T> path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path.Push(item);Di2015NewLine        if (condition(item) || Path(childrenSelector(item), childrenSelector, condition, path))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            path.Pop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18731419Di2015UniqueSeparator% make sure the .NET assembly is loadedDi2015NewLineNET.addAssembly('System.Drawing');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% read image from file as BitmapDi2015NewLinebmp = System.Drawing.Bitmap(which('football.jpg'));Di2015NewLinew = bmp.Width;Di2015NewLineh = bmp.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% lock bitmap into memory for readingDi2015NewLinebmpData = bmp.LockBits(System.Drawing.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h), ...Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% get pointer to pixels, and copy RGB values into an array of bytesDi2015NewLinenum = abs(bmpData.Stride) * h;Di2015NewLinebytes = NET.createArray('System.Byte', num);Di2015NewLineSystem.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(bmpData.Scan0, bytes, 0, num);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% unlock bitmapDi2015NewLinebmp.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% cleanupDi2015NewLineclear bmp bmpData numDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% convert to MATLAB imageDi2015NewLinebytes = uint8(bytes);Di2015NewLineimg = permute(flipdim(reshape(reshape(bytes,3,w*h)',[w,h,3]),3),[2 1 3]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine% show resultDi2015NewLineimshow(img)Di2015NewLine
18731419Di2015UniqueSeparator% bitmap RGB values are interleaved: b1,g1,r1,b2,g2,r2,...Di2015NewLine% and stored in a row-major orderDi2015NewLineb = reshape(bytes(1:3:end), [w,h])';Di2015NewLineg = reshape(bytes(2:3:end), [w,h])';Di2015NewLiner = reshape(bytes(3:3:end), [w,h])';Di2015NewLineimg = cat(3, r,g,b);Di2015NewLine

18731553Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsNMEAMessageValid("$GPRMC,102957.92,A,4104.8569,N,00836.4700,W,0.000,5.822,230211,0,W,A*2B").ToString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsNMEAMessageValid("$GPRMC,102957.92,A,4104.8569,N,00836.4700,W,0.000,5.822,230211,0,W,A*1B").ToString());   // should be false, changed the checksum from 2B to 1BDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsTAIPMessageValid(">RPV68168+4008572-0828021400026912;ID=M123;*d<").ToString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsTAIPMessageValid(">RPV68168+4008572-0828021400026912;ID=M123;*c<").ToString());    // should be false, changed the checksum from d to cDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsTAIPMessageValid(">RPV54366+4001403-0828656300005512;ID=GH75;*7c<").ToString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(IsTAIPMessageValid(">RPV54366+4001403-0828656300005512;ID=GH75;*7b<").ToString());    // should be false, changed the checksum from 7c to 7bDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsNMEAMessageValid(string sentence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Checksum for NMEA includes XOR on all characters between (not including) the $ and the *, including the commas...Di2015NewLine        int checksum = Convert.ToByte(sentence[sentence.IndexOf('$') + 1]);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = sentence.IndexOf('$') + 2; i < sentence.IndexOf('*'); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            checksum ^= Convert.ToByte(sentence[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int givenChecksum = Convert.ToInt16(sentence.Split('*')[1], 16);Di2015NewLine        return checksum == givenChecksum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsTAIPMessageValid(string sentence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Checksum for TAIP includes XOR on all characters starting with > and up to and including *Di2015NewLine        int checksum = Convert.ToByte(sentence[sentence.IndexOf('>')]);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = sentence.IndexOf('>') + 1; i < sentence.IndexOf('*') + 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            checksum ^= Convert.ToByte(sentence[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        char[] splitChars = { '*', '<' };Di2015NewLine        int givenChecksum = Convert.ToInt16(sentence.Split(splitChars)[1], 16);Di2015NewLine        return checksum == givenChecksum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18738491Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Transactions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var locker = new SqlApplicationLock("MyAceApplication",Di2015NewLine                "Server=xxx;Database=scratch;User Id=xx;Password=xxx;");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Aquiring the lock");Di2015NewLine            using (locker.TakeLock(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(2)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Lock Aquired, doing work which no one else can do. Press any key to release the lock.");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Lock Released"); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class SqlApplicationLock : IDisposableDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private readonly String _uniqueId;Di2015NewLine            private readonly SqlConnection _sqlConnection;Di2015NewLine            private Boolean _isLockTaken = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public SqlApplicationLock(Di2015NewLine                String uniqueId,                 Di2015NewLine                String connectionString)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _uniqueId = uniqueId;Di2015NewLine                _sqlConnection = new SqlConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine                _sqlConnection.Open();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public IDisposable TakeLock(TimeSpan takeLockTimeout)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (TransactionScope transactionScope = new TransactionScope(TransactionScopeOption.Suppress))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SqlCommand sqlCommand = new SqlCommand("sp_getapplock", _sqlConnection);Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.CommandTimeout = (int)takeLockTimeout.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("Resource", _uniqueId);Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("LockOwner", "Session");Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("LockMode", "Exclusive");Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("LockTimeout", (Int32)takeLockTimeout.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    SqlParameter returnValue = sqlCommand.Parameters.Add("ReturnValue", SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLine                    returnValue.Direction = ParameterDirection.ReturnValue;Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if ((int)returnValue.Value < 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        throw new Exception(String.Format("sp_getapplock failed with errorCode '{0}'",Di2015NewLine                            returnValue.Value));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    _isLockTaken = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    transactionScope.Complete();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return this;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void ReleaseLock()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (TransactionScope transactionScope = new TransactionScope(TransactionScopeOption.Suppress))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SqlCommand sqlCommand = new SqlCommand("sp_releaseapplock", _sqlConnection);Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("Resource", _uniqueId);Di2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.Parameters.AddWithValue("LockOwner", "Session");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                    _isLockTaken = false;Di2015NewLine                    transactionScope.Complete();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_isLockTaken)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ReleaseLock();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                _sqlConnection.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18740792Di2015UniqueSeparator7.19 Constant expressions
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparatorA constant-expression is an expression that can be fully evaluated at compile-time.
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparatorOnly the following constructs are permitted in constant expressions:
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparator•  **Default value expressions**
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst DateTime
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparator10.4 Constants
18740792Di2015UniqueSeparatorThe type specified in a constant declaration must be sbyte, byte, short, ushort, int, uint, long, ulong, char, float, double, decimal, bool, string, an enum-type, or a reference-type.
18740874Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DecimalModelBinder : IModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var valueResult = bindingContext.ValueProvider.GetValue(bindingContext.ModelName);Di2015NewLine        var modelState = new ModelState {Value = valueResult};Di2015NewLine        object actualValue = null;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Try to convert the actual number that was recieved.Di2015NewLine            actualValue = Convert.ToDecimal(valueResult.AttemptedValue, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Replace any . with , and try to convert.Di2015NewLine                actualValue = Convert.ToDecimal(valueResult.AttemptedValue.Replace('.',','), CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Replace any , with . and try to convert.Di2015NewLine                    actualValue = Convert.ToDecimal(valueResult.AttemptedValue.Replace(',', '.'), CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    modelState.Errors.Add(ex);                                               Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bindingContext.ModelState.Add(bindingContext.ModelName, modelState);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return actualValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
