18741548Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void DataGrid_OnBeginningEdit(object sender, DataGridBeginningEditEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point newPosition = new Point();Di2015NewLine        if (!(lstvwProductCode.RenderTransform is TransformGroup))Di2015NewLine            lstvwProductCode.RenderTransform = new TransformGroup();// set the ListView's RenderTransform to a TransformGroup if it isn't alreadyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataGrid dg = GetRowsDataGrid(e.Row); //get the Row's corresponding DataGrid with the help of the VisualTreeHelper. You cant use the Column here, because it won't get added to the visual tree.Di2015NewLine        if (dg != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double rowX = GetColumnXPosition(e.Column, dg); //get the x position. Here you can't use .TranslatePoint because - again - it doesn't belong to the visual tree, so you have to sum up all columns width' to the column where the changes are made.Di2015NewLine            newPosition = e.Row.TranslatePoint(new Point(rowX + 5, e.Row.ActualHeight), this); //translate this point to a point on your main window.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (newPosition != new Point())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point tPoint = lstvwProductCode.TranslatePoint(new Point(0, 0), this);//add this pointDi2015NewLine            ((TransformGroup) lstvwProductCode.RenderTransform).Children.Add(Di2015NewLine                new TranslateTransform(newPosition.X - tPoint.X, newPosition.Y - tPoint.Y));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double GetColumnXPosition(DataGridColumn column, DataGrid grid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double result = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (grid == null)Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < grid.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataGridColumn dgc = grid.Columns[i];Di2015NewLine            if (dgc.Equals(column))Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result += dgc.ActualWidth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private DataGrid GetRowsDataGrid(DataGridRow row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DependencyObject result = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(row);Di2015NewLine        while (result != null && !(result is DataGrid))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result as DataGrid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18742636Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void SetFileSecurity(String filePath, String domainName, String userName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get file infoDi2015NewLine        FileInfo fi = new FileInfo(filePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get security accessDi2015NewLine        FileSecurity fs = fi.GetAccessControl();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //remove any inherited accessDi2015NewLine        fs.SetAccessRuleProtection(true, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get any special user accessDi2015NewLine        AuthorizationRuleCollection rules = fs.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(System.Security.Principal.NTAccount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //remove any special accessDi2015NewLine        foreach (FileSystemAccessRule rule in rules)Di2015NewLine            fs.RemoveAccessRule(rule);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add current user with full control.Di2015NewLine        fs.AddAccessRule(new FileSystemAccessRule(domainName + "\\\\" + userName, FileSystemRights.FullControl, AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add all other users delete only permissions.Di2015NewLine        fs.AddAccessRule(new FileSystemAccessRule("Authenticated Users", FileSystemRights.Delete, AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //flush security access.Di2015NewLine        File.SetAccessControl(filePath, fs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18742902Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<=\\s)([^=]+)="([^"]+)"Di2015NewLine
18742902Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar input = @"<?UMBRACO_MACRO redirectto=""/sagen.aspx"" loginpage=""/Login.aspx"" macroAlias=""BrowserValidation"" />";Di2015NewLinevar matches = Regex.Matches(input, @"(?<=\\s)([^=]+)=""([^""]+)""");Di2015NewLineforeach (Match match in matches) {Di2015NewLine    Console.Write(match.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine    Console.Write(" : ");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(match.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18742902Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar input = @"<?UMBRACO_MACRO redirectto=""/sagen.aspx"" loginpage=""/Login.aspx"" macroAlias=""BrowserValidation"" />";Di2015NewLinevar matches = Regex.Matches(input, @"(?<=\\s)([^=]+)=""([^""]+)""");Di2015NewLinevar dictionary = matches.Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine    .Select( m => new {Key = m.Groups[1].Value, Value = m.Groups[2].Value } )Di2015NewLine    .ToDictionary(pair => pair.Key, pair => pair.Value);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(dictionary);Di2015NewLine

18743467Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class NumericExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static double RoundToSignificantFigures(this double num, int n)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (num == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double magnitude = Math.Pow(10, n - (int)Math.Ceiling(Math.Log10(Math.Abs(num))));Di2015NewLine            double shifted = Math.Round(num * magnitude);Di2015NewLine            return shifted / magnitude;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static double RoundToSignificantFiguresWithConvert(this double num, int n)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sigFigFormatted = num.ToString("G" + n.ToString());Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToDouble(sigFigFormatted);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static string[] Test1(double[] numbers, int numberOfSigFigs, int numberOfDecimalPlaces)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = new string[numbers.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result[i] = numbers[i].RoundToSignificantFigures(numberOfSigFigs).ToString("F" + numberOfDecimalPlaces.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string[] Test2(double[] numbers, int numberOfSigFigs, int numberOfDecimalPlaces)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = new string[numbers.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result[i] = numbers[i].RoundToSignificantFiguresWithConvert(numberOfSigFigs).ToString("F" + numberOfDecimalPlaces.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // create an array or random numbers Di2015NewLine            var rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine            var numbers = new double[100000];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                numbers[i] = 10000000000000000000D * (rng.NextDouble() - 0.5D);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int numberOfSigFigs = 3;Di2015NewLine            const int numberOfDecimalPlaces = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // make first run without time measurementDi2015NewLine            Test1(numbers, numberOfSigFigs, numberOfDecimalPlaces);Di2015NewLine            Test2(numbers, numberOfSigFigs, numberOfDecimalPlaces);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int numberOfIterations = 100;Di2015NewLine            var sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine            sw.Start();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numberOfIterations; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Test1(numbers, numberOfSigFigs, numberOfDecimalPlaces);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Test1 elapsed {0} ms", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numberOfIterations; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Test2(numbers, numberOfSigFigs, numberOfDecimalPlaces);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Test2 elapsed {0} ms", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18743910Di2015UniqueSeparatorGuid
18743910Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, Guid>
18743910Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void WriteGuidFile(string filename, Dictionary<string, Guid>guids)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var fs = File.Create(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new BinaryWriter(fs, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<int> stringIndex = new List<int>(guids.Count);Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder bigString = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // write countDi2015NewLine            writer.Write(guids.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write the GUIDs and build the string indexDi2015NewLine            foreach (var pair in guids)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.Write(pair.Value.ToByteArray(), 0, 16);Di2015NewLine                stringIndex.Add(bigString.Length);Di2015NewLine                bigString.Append(pair.Key);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Add one more entry to the string index.Di2015NewLine            // makes deserializing easierDi2015NewLine            stringIndex.Add(bigString.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write the string that contains all of the strings, combinedDi2015NewLine            writer.Write(bigString.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // write the indexDi2015NewLine            foreach (var ix in stringIndex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.Write(ix);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18743910Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<string, Guid> ReadGuidFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var fs = File.OpenRead(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new BinaryReader(fs, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // read the countDi2015NewLine            int count = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The guids are in a huge byte array sized 16*countDi2015NewLine            byte[] guidsBuffer = new byte[16*count];Di2015NewLine            reader.Read(guidsBuffer, 0, guidsBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Strings are all concatenated into oneDi2015NewLine            var bigString = reader.ReadString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Index is an array of int. We can read it as an array ofDi2015NewLine            // ((count+1) * 4) bytes.Di2015NewLine            byte[] indexBuffer = new byte[4*(count+1)];Di2015NewLine            reader.Read(indexBuffer, 0, indexBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var guids = new Dictionary<string, Guid>(count);Di2015NewLine            byte[] guidBytes = new byte[16];Di2015NewLine            int startix = 0;Di2015NewLine            int endix = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                endix = BitConverter.ToInt32(indexBuffer, 4*(i+1));Di2015NewLine                string key = bigString.Substring(startix, endix - startix);Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(guidsBuffer, (i*16),Di2015NewLine                                    guidBytes, 0, 16);Di2015NewLine                guids.Add(key, new Guid(guidBytes));Di2015NewLine                startix = endix;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return guids;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18744876Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> SearchAllFields<T>(string searchText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    Expression body = Expression.Constant(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var containsMethod = typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains"Di2015NewLine        , new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLine    var toStringMethod = typeof(object).GetMethod("ToString");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var stringProperties = typeof(T).GetProperties()Di2015NewLine        .Where(property => property.PropertyType == typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var property in stringProperties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var stringValue = Expression.Call(Expression.Property(t, property.Name),Di2015NewLine            toStringMethod);Di2015NewLine        var nextExpression = Expression.Call(stringValue,Di2015NewLine            containsMethod,Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(searchText));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        body = Expression.OrElse(body, nextExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, t);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18747904Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool AttachConsole(uint dwProcessId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true, ExactSpelling = true)]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool FreeConsole();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Delegate type to be used as the Handler Routine for SCCHDi2015NewLine        delegate Boolean ConsoleCtrlDelegate(CtrlTypes CtrlType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        static extern bool SetConsoleCtrlHandler(ConsoleCtrlDelegate HandlerRoutine, bool Add);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerated type for the control messages sent to the handler routineDi2015NewLine        enum CtrlTypes : uintDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CTRL_C_EVENT = 0,Di2015NewLine            CTRL_BREAK_EVENT,Di2015NewLine            CTRL_CLOSE_EVENT,Di2015NewLine            CTRL_LOGOFF_EVENT = 5,Di2015NewLine            CTRL_SHUTDOWN_EVENTDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool GenerateConsoleCtrlEvent(CtrlTypes dwCtrlEvent, uint dwProcessGroupId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Immediately halts all running processes under this ProcessManager's control.Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        public static void HaltAllProcesses()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < runningProcesses.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Process p = runningProcesses[i];Di2015NewLine                uint pid = (uint)p.Id;Di2015NewLine                //This does not require the console window to be visible.Di2015NewLine                if (AttachConsole(pid))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Disable Ctrl-C handling for our programDi2015NewLine                    SetConsoleCtrlHandler(null, true);Di2015NewLine                    GenerateConsoleCtrlEvent(CtrlTypes.CTRL_C_EVENT, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Must wait here. If we don't and re-enable Ctrl-CDi2015NewLine                    //handling below too fast, we might terminate ourselves.Di2015NewLine                    p.WaitForExit(2000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    FreeConsole();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Re-enable Ctrl-C handling or any subsequently startedDi2015NewLine                    //programs will inherit the disabled state.Di2015NewLine                    SetConsoleCtrlHandler(null, false);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!p.HasExited)Di2015NewLine                { //for console-driven processes, this won't even do anything... (it'll kill the cmd line, but not the actual process)Di2015NewLine                    tryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        p.Kill();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    catch (InvalidOperationException e) Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        controller.PrintImportantError("Process " + p.Id + " failed to exit! Error: " + e.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine

18750638Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static BlockingCollection<string> _itemsToProcess = new BlockingCollection<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InsertWorker();Di2015NewLine        GenerateItems(10, 1000);Di2015NewLine        _itemsToProcess.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void InsertWorker()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!_itemsToProcess.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string t;Di2015NewLine                if (_itemsToProcess.TryTake(out t))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Do whatever needs doing hereDi2015NewLine                    // Order should be guaranteed since BlockingCollection Di2015NewLine                    // uses a ConcurrentQueue as a backing store by default.Di2015NewLine                    // http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd287184.aspx#remarksToggleDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(t);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void GenerateItems(int count, int maxDelayInMs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLine        string[] items = new string[count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            items[i] = i.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simulate many threads adding items to the collectionDi2015NewLine        itemsDi2015NewLine            .AsParallel()Di2015NewLine            .WithDegreeOfParallelism(4)Di2015NewLine            .WithExecutionMode(ParallelExecutionMode.ForceParallelism)Di2015NewLine            .Select((x) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(r.Next(maxDelayInMs));Di2015NewLine                _itemsToProcess.Add(x);Di2015NewLine                return x;Di2015NewLine            }).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

preset.Item1 : newValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18753267Di2015UniqueSeparator//username=bob&password=123&a=Cheese&b=Chocolate&a=Cat&b=DogDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LoginRequestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string username { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string password { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<OtherClass> d { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class OtherClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string a { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string b { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var request = new LoginRequestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        username = "bob",Di2015NewLine        password = "123",Di2015NewLine        d = new List<OtherClass> { new OtherClass { a = "Cheese", b = "Chocolate" } ,Di2015NewLine        new OtherClass { a = "Cat", b = "Dog" } }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ObjectToQueryString(request));Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string ObjectToQueryString<T>(T obj) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable data = obj as IEnumerable ?? new[] { obj };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var datum in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = datum.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var properties = t.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo p in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (p.CanRead)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var indexes = p.GetIndexParameters();Di2015NewLine                if (indexes.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var pp = p.GetValue(datum, new object[] { 1 });Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(ObjectToQueryString(pp));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(p.PropertyType) && p.PropertyType  != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(ObjectToQueryString(p.GetValue(datum)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //I dont think this is a good way to do itDi2015NewLine                    if (p.PropertyType.FullName != p.GetValue(datum, null).ToString())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //sb.Append(String.Format("{0}={1}&", p.Name, HttpUtility.UrlEncode(p.GetValue(datum, null).ToString())));Di2015NewLine                        sb.Append(String.Format("{0}={1}&", p.Name, p.GetValue(datum, null).ToString()));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sb.Append(ObjectToQueryString(p.GetValue(datum, null)));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString().TrimEnd('&');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18753516Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoggerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private static Dictionary<int, List<Action<string>>> _callbacks = new Dictionary<int,List<Action<string>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RegisterLoggerCallback(int errorType, Action<string> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Just using errortype in this exaple, but the key can be anything you want.Di2015NewLine        if (!_callbacks.ContainsKey(errorType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _callbacks.Add(errorType, new List<Action<string>>());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _callbacks[errorType].Add(callback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RegisterLog(int errorType, int errorID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // find error sring with codesDi2015NewLine        string error = "MyError";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // show messageboxDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(error);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // tell listenersDi2015NewLine        if (_callbacks.ContainsKey(errorType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _callbacks[errorType].ForEach(a => a(error));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ModelDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Model()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoSomething()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Logger.RegisterLog(1, 2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Presenter Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Presenter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Logger.RegisterLoggerCallback(1, AddToListbox);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddToListbox(string error)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // add to listbox when errortype 1 is called somewhereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18755413Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NestedArrayConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value.GetType() == typeof(List<string>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var list = (List<string>)value;Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteStartArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var str in list)Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteRawValue(str);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            writer.WriteEndArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteValue(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.StartArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine            var value = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (reader.TokenType != JsonToken.EndArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value.Add(JObject.Load(reader).ToString());Di2015NewLine                reader.Read();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return serializer.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18761031Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void BeginProcessing()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      using (GetRandomCommand.tracer.TraceMethod())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (this.SetSeed.HasValue)Di2015NewLine          this.Generator = new Random(this.SetSeed.Value);Di2015NewLine        if (this.EffectiveParameterSet == GetRandomCommand.MyParameterSet.RandomNumber)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          if (this.IsInt(this.Maximum) && this.IsInt(this.Minimum))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            int minValue = this.ConvertToInt(this.Minimum, 0);Di2015NewLine            int maxValue = this.ConvertToInt(this.Maximum, int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine            if (minValue >= maxValue)Di2015NewLine              this.ThrowMinGreaterThanOrEqualMax((object) minValue, (object) maxValue);Di2015NewLine            this.WriteObject((object) this.Generator.Next(minValue, maxValue));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            double min = this.ConvertToDouble(this.Minimum, 0.0);Di2015NewLine            double max = this.ConvertToDouble(this.Maximum, double.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine            if (min >= max)Di2015NewLine              this.ThrowMinGreaterThanOrEqualMax((object) min, (object) max);Di2015NewLine            this.WriteObject((object) this.GetRandomDouble(min, max));Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          if (this.EffectiveParameterSet != GetRandomCommand.MyParameterSet.RandomListItem)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine          this.chosenListItems = new List<object>();Di2015NewLine          this.numberOfProcessedListItems = 0;Di2015NewLine          if (this.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine          this.Count = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18762537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpermutations
18762537Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> permutations<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var c = source.Count();Di2015NewLine    if (length == 1 || c == 1)Di2015NewLine        foreach(var x in source)Di2015NewLine            yield return new T[] { x };Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < c; i++)Di2015NewLine            foreach (var p in permutations(source.Take(i).Concat(source.Skip(i + 1)), length - 1))Di2015NewLine                yield return source.Skip(i).Take(1).Concat(p);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18762537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permutations<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("source");Di2015NewLine    var src = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= src.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        foreach (var result in permutations(src, i))Di2015NewLine            yield return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18764641Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetNotes(this WordprocessingDocument doc, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MainDocumentPart main = doc.MainDocumentPart;Di2015NewLine    string altChunkId = "AltChunkId" + Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Replace("-", "");Di2015NewLine    var chunk = main.AddAlternativeFormatImportPart(AlternativeFormatImportPartType.TextPlain, altChunkId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var mStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new StreamWriter(mStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(value);Di2015NewLine            writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine            mStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            chunk.FeedData(mStream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var altChunk = new AltChunk();Di2015NewLine    altChunk.Id = altChunkId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    OpenXmlElement afterThat = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var para in main.Document.Body.Descendants<Paragraph>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (para.InnerText.Equals("Notes:"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            afterThat = para;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    main.Document.Body.InsertAfter(altChunk, afterThat);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18766131Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegisterWaitForSingleObject
18766131Di2015UniqueSeparatorMAXIMUM_WAIT_OBJECTS
18766131Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class WaitHandleExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Task AsTask(this WaitHandle handle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return AsTask(handle, Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Task AsTask(this WaitHandle handle, TimeSpan timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine        var registration = ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(handle, (state, timedOut) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var localTcs = (TaskCompletionSource<object>)state;Di2015NewLine            if (timedOut)Di2015NewLine                localTcs.TrySetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                localTcs.TrySetResult(null);Di2015NewLine        }, tcs, timeout, executeOnlyOnce: true);Di2015NewLine        tcs.Task.ContinueWith((_, state) => ((RegisteredWaitHandle)state).Unregister(null), registration, TaskScheduler.Default);Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18770204Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string decryptScore(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var firstDigitArray = new List<string>{ "f85au", "kt50e", "cmt5s", "v5072", "fc5i3", "56f7l", "7gj81", "yn90y", "5o3ko", "ntakn" };Di2015NewLine    var secondDigitArray = new List<string> { "hkym6", "xj97c", "54v6q", "nawf9", "9e1gp", "9gww9", "5oj5p", "0ba5t", "yizld", "bt064" };Di2015NewLine    var thirdDigitArray = new List<string> { "uku91", "rn2k4", "uuq78", "nkurt", "8kxqs", "9p7kc", "hd8x6", "57b6o", "7iucu", "do6bq" };Di2015NewLine    var fourthDigitArray = new List<string> { "0hdro", "0wqrc", "wa5ny", "857mg", "3f7ro", "kerph", "0mhw1", "tpb8f", "8rho3", "4hc11" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var digitsArray = new List<List<string>>{ firstDigitArray, secondDigitArray, thirdDigitArray, fourthDigitArray };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string decryptedScore = "";Di2015NewLine    int scorelength = s.Length / 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < scorelength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string d = s.Substring(i * 5, 5);Di2015NewLine        decryptedScore += (digitsArray[i].FindIndex(x=>x==d));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return decryptedScore;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18770397Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var myList = new List<MyThing>{Di2015NewLine        new MyThing{Name="Lee", Age=31},Di2015NewLine        new MyThing{Name="Dave", Age=37},Di2015NewLine        new MyThing{Name="Erik", Age=44},Di2015NewLine        new MyThing{Name="Bart", Age=24},Di2015NewLine        new MyThing{Name="James", Age=32},Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var subscription = Observable.Merge(myList.Select(t=>t.OnAnyPropertyChanges()))Di2015NewLine                .Subscribe(x=>Console.WriteLine("{0} is {1}", x.Name, x.Age));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    myList[0].Age = 33;Di2015NewLine    myList[3].Name = "Bob";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    subscription.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define other methods and classes hereDi2015NewLinepublic class MyThing : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineprivate string _name;Di2015NewLineprivate int _age;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string NameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get { return _name; 18771492Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object Get(FindCustomers request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var customers = new List<Customer>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ev = OrmLiteConfig.DialectProvider.ExpressionVisitor<Customer>();Di2015NewLine    ev.Where(c => c.LastName == request.LastName).And(c => c.Age == request.Age);Di2015NewLine    AddOptionalFilters(ev, request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    customers = Db.Select<Customer>(ev);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return customers;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddOptionalFilters(SqlExpressionVisitor<Customer> expressionVisitor, FindCustomers request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (request.City.HasValue)Di2015NewLine    { expressionVisitor.Where(c => c.City == request.City); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (request.ZipCode.HasValue)Di2015NewLine    { expressionVisitor.Where(c => c.ZipCode == request.ZipCode); }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
18771492Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object Get(FindCustomers request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var customers = new List<Customer>();          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sqlAndParams = SqlAndParameters("SELECT * From Customers", request); //this returns a tuple of the sql string and the parametersDi2015NewLine    customers = Db.Query<Customer>(sqlAndParams.Item1, sqlAndParams.Item2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return customers;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic virtual Tuple<String, IDictionary<string, object>> SqlAndParameters(string sql, FindCustomers request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var builder = new SqlBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var selector = builder.AddTemplate(sql);Di2015NewLine    var sqlParams = new ExpandoObject() as IDictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    builder.Where("LastName=@LastName");Di2015NewLine    sqlParams.Add("LastName", request.LastName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    builder.Where("Age=@Age");Di2015NewLine    sqlParams.Add("Age", request.Age);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (request.City.HasValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        builder.Where("City=@City");Di2015NewLine        sqlParams.Add("City", request.City);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (request.ZipCode.HasValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        builder.Where("ZipCode=@ZipCode");Di2015NewLine        sqlParams.Add("ZipCode", request.ZipCode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(selector.RawSql, sqlParams);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18773761Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TimeLimitedTaskScheduler : TaskSchedulerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int _TaskCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch _Sw = null;Di2015NewLine    int _MaxTasksPerSecond;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimeLimitedTaskScheduler(int maxTasksPerSecond)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _MaxTasksPerSecond = maxTasksPerSecond;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void QueueTask(Task task)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_TaskCount == 0) _Sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var shouldWait = (1000 / _MaxTasksPerSecond) * _TaskCount - _Sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (shouldWait < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            shouldWait = _TaskCount = 0;Di2015NewLine            _Sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.Delay((int)shouldWait)Di2015NewLine            .ContinueWith(t => ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem((_) => base.TryExecuteTask(task)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _TaskCount++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override bool TryExecuteTaskInline(Task task, bool taskWasPreviouslyQueued)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return base.TryExecuteTask(task);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override IEnumerable<Task> GetScheduledTasks()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18782448Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is for testing purposes!Di2015NewLine        var loadedAssembliesBefore = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var domain = AppDomain.CreateDomain("ChildDomain");                        Di2015NewLine        // This will make the call to the static method in the dhild AppDomain.Di2015NewLine        domain.DoCallBack(LoadAssemblyAndCallStaticMethod);Di2015NewLine        // Print the loaded assemblies on the child AppDomain. This is for testing purposes!Di2015NewLine        domain.DoCallBack(PrintLoadedAssemblies);Di2015NewLine        AppDomain.Unload(domain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This is for testing purposes!Di2015NewLine        var loadedAssembliesAfter = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies();Di2015NewLine        // Assert that no assembly was leaked to the main AppDomain.Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(!loadedAssembliesBefore.Except(loadedAssembliesAfter).Any());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loads StaticMethodInHere.dll to the current AppDomain and calls static method Di2015NewLine    // StaticClass.DoSomething.  Di2015NewLine    static void LoadAssemblyAndCallStaticMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var assembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(@"PATH_TO_ASSEMBLY");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        assembly.GetType("CLASS_CONTAINING_STATIC_METHOD")Di2015NewLine                .InvokeMember("STATIC_METHOD", Di2015NewLine                              BindingFlags.Public | Di2015NewLine                              BindingFlags.Static | Di2015NewLine                              BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, Di2015NewLine                              null, Di2015NewLine                              null, Di2015NewLine                              null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Prints the loaded assebmlies in the current AppDomain. For testing purposes.Di2015NewLine    static void PrintLoadedAssemblies()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("/ Assemblies in {0} -------------------------------",Di2015NewLine                          AppDomain.CurrentDomain.FriendlyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(assembly.FullName);Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18785414Di2015UniqueSeparator$(document).ready(function () {Di2015NewLine        countDown(endTime);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    function countDown(endTime) {Di2015NewLine        if (endTime > 0) {Di2015NewLine            $('#countDiv').text(secondsToTime(endTime));Di2015NewLine            setTimeout(function () { countDown(endTime - 1); }, 1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLinefunction secondsToTime(secs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var hours = Math.floor(secs / (60 * 60));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var divisor_for_minutes = secs % (60 * 60);Di2015NewLine    var minutes = Math.floor(divisor_for_minutes / 60);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var divisor_for_seconds = divisor_for_minutes % 60;Di2015NewLine    var seconds = Math.ceil(divisor_for_seconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return hours +':' + minutes + ':' + seconds;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18795734Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CommentToUpper(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = input.IndexOf("/*");Di2015NewLine    if (index >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int endIndex = input.LastIndexOf("*/");Di2015NewLine        if (endIndex > index)Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0}/*{1}*/{2}", Di2015NewLine                input.Substring(0, index), Di2015NewLine                input.Substring(index + 2, endIndex - index - 2).ToUpper(), Di2015NewLine                input.Substring(endIndex + 2));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0}/*{1}", Di2015NewLine                input.Substring(0, index), Di2015NewLine                input.Substring(index + 2).ToUpper());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return input;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

           if (this.value && (!request.term || matcher.test(text)))Di2015NewLine                return {Di2015NewLine                    label: text,Di2015NewLine                    value: {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Selected an item, nothing to doDi2015NewLine        if (ui.item) {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //             .val("")Di2015NewLine              .attr("title", value + " didn't match any item")Di2015NewLine              .tooltip("open");Di2015NewLine            this.element.val("");Di2015NewLine 18817182Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar keyValuePairLines = File.ReadLines(pathInputFile)Di2015NewLine    .Select(l =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        l = l.Replace("@VAR;", "").Replace("@ENDVAR;", "").Replace("Op==;", "");Di2015NewLine        string[] tokens = l.Split(new[]{';'}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        var lineValues = new List<KeyValuePair<string, string>>();Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < tokens.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Value to a variable can be found on the next index, therefore i += 2Di2015NewLine            string[] pair = tokens[i].Split('=');Di2015NewLine            string key = pair.Last();Di2015NewLine            string value = null;Di2015NewLine            string nextToken = tokens.ElementAtOrDefault(i + 1);Di2015NewLine            if (nextToken != null)Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                pair = nextToken.Split('=');Di2015NewLine                value = pair.Last();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var keyVal = new KeyValuePair<string, string>(key, value);Di2015NewLine            lineValues.Add(keyVal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return lineValues;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFile.WriteAllLines(pathOutputFile, keyValuePairLines.SelectMany(l => Di2015NewLine    l.Select(kv=>string.Format("{0} = {1}", kv.Key, kv.Value))));Di2015NewLine

18819403Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.DarkGray;Di2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.ScrollBarsEnabled = false;Di2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.Dock = DockStyle.None;Di2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.Size = new System.Drawing.Size(320, 200);Di2015NewLine    DownloadAsync("http://www.example.com").ContinueWith((task) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var html = task.Result;Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(String.Format(Di2015NewLine            "WebBrowser.Size: {0}, Document.Window.Size: {1}, Document.Body.ScrollRectangle: {2}\\n\\n{3}",Di2015NewLine            this.webBrowser.Size,Di2015NewLine            this.webBrowser.Document.Window.Size,Di2015NewLine            this.webBrowser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Size,Di2015NewLine            html));Di2015NewLine        this.webBrowser.Size = this.webBrowser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Size;Di2015NewLine    }, TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineasync Task<string> DownloadAsync(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<bool> onloadTcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLine    WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    handler = delegateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.webBrowser.DocumentCompleted -= handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // attach to subscribe to DOM onload eventDi2015NewLine        this.webBrowser.Document.Window.AttachEventHandler("onload", delegateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // each navigation has its own TaskCompletionSourceDi2015NewLine            if (onloadTcs.Task.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine                return; // this should not be happeningDi2015NewLine            // signal the completion of the page loadingDi2015NewLine            onloadTcs.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // register DocumentCompleted handlerDi2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.DocumentCompleted += handler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Navigate to urlDi2015NewLine    this.webBrowser.Navigate(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // continue upon onloadDi2015NewLine    await onloadTcs.Task;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the document has been fully loaded, can access DOM hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return the current HTML snapshotDi2015NewLine    return ((dynamic)this.webBrowser.Document.DomDocument).documentElement.outerHTML.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18821996Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Color> Range(this Color firstColor, Color lastColor, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float stepHueClockwise = GetStepping(firstColor.GetHue(), lastColor.GetHue(), count, Direction.Clockwise);Di2015NewLine    float stepHueCounterClockwise = GetStepping(firstColor.GetHue(), lastColor.GetHue(), count, Direction.CounterClockwise);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(stepHueClockwise) >= Math.Abs(stepHueCounterClockwise))Di2015NewLine        return Range(firstColor, lastColor, count, Direction.Clockwise);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return Range(firstColor, lastColor, count, Direction.CounterClockwise);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Color> Range(this Color firstColor, Color lastColor, int count, Direction hueDirection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var color = firstColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (count <= 0)Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (count == 1)Di2015NewLine        yield return firstColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float startingHue = color.GetHue();Di2015NewLine    float stepHue = GetStepping(firstColor.GetHue(), lastColor.GetHue(), count - 1, hueDirection);Di2015NewLine    var stepSaturation = (lastColor.GetSaturation() - firstColor.GetSaturation()) / (count - 1);Di2015NewLine    var stepBrightness = (lastColor.GetBrightness() - firstColor.GetBrightness()) / (count - 1);Di2015NewLine    var stepAlpha = (lastColor.A - firstColor.A) / (count - 1.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return color;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var hueValue = startingHue + stepHue * i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hueValue > 360)Di2015NewLine            hueValue -= 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hueValue < 0)Di2015NewLine            hueValue = 360 + hueValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        color = FromAhsb(Di2015NewLine                    Clamp((int)(color.A + stepAlpha), 0, 255),Di2015NewLine                         hueValue,Di2015NewLine                         Clamp(color.GetSaturation() + stepSaturation, 0, 1),Di2015NewLine                         Clamp(color.GetBrightness() + stepBrightness, 0, 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return lastColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum DirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Clockwise = 0,Di2015NewLine        CounterClockwise = 1Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static float GetStepping(float start, float end, int count, Direction direction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var hueDiff = end - start;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case Direction.CounterClockwise:Di2015NewLine            if (hueDiff >= 0)Di2015NewLine                hueDiff = (360 - hueDiff) * -1;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            if (hueDiff <= 0)Di2015NewLine                hueDiff = 360 + hueDiff;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return hueDiff / count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Clamp(int value, int min, int max)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value < min)Di2015NewLine        return min;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value > max)Di2015NewLine        return max;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static float Clamp(float value, float min, float max)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value < min)Di2015NewLine        return min;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value > max)Di2015NewLine        return max;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18825307Di2015UniqueSeparatorSymbolDocument()
18825307Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar asm = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(new AssemblyName("foo"), System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave);Di2015NewLinevar mod = asm.DefineDynamicModule("mymod", true);Di2015NewLinevar type = mod.DefineType("baz", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLinevar method = type.DefineMethod("go", MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.Static);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExpression fooExpression = Expression.Divide(Expression.Constant(0), Expression.Constant(0));Di2015NewLinevar parameters = new ParameterExpression[0];Di2015NewLinevar generator = DebugInfoGenerator.CreatePdbGenerator();Di2015NewLinevar document = Expression.SymbolDocument(fileName: "MyDebug.txt");Di2015NewLinevar debugInfo = Expression.DebugInfo(document, 6, 9, 6, 22);Di2015NewLinevar expressionBlock = Expression.Block(debugInfo, fooExpression);Di2015NewLinevar lambda = Expression.Lambda(expressionBlock, parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelambda.CompileToMethod(method, generator);Di2015NewLinevar bakedType = type.CreateType();Di2015NewLineFunc<int> method2 = (Func<int>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int>), bakedType.GetMethod(method.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int res = method2();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18825307Di2015UniqueSeparatorSymbolDocument
18825307Di2015UniqueSeparatorDebugInfo
18825307Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create a dynamic assembly and module Di2015NewLine    AssemblyName assemblyName = new AssemblyName("HelloWorld");Di2015NewLine    AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilder = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(assemblyName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Mark generated code as debuggable. Di2015NewLine    // See http://blogs.msdn.com/rmbyers/archive/2005/06/26/432922.aspx for explanation.        Di2015NewLine    Type daType = typeof(DebuggableAttribute);Di2015NewLine    ConstructorInfo daCtor = daType.GetConstructor(new Type[] { typeof(DebuggableAttribute.DebuggingModes) });Di2015NewLine    CustomAttributeBuilder daBuilder = new CustomAttributeBuilder(daCtor, new object[] { Di2015NewLine    DebuggableAttribute.DebuggingModes.DisableOptimizations | Di2015NewLine    DebuggableAttribute.DebuggingModes.Default });Di2015NewLine    assemblyBuilder.SetCustomAttribute(daBuilder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ModuleBuilder module = assemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule("HelloWorld.exe", true); // <-- pass 'true' to track debug info.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var doc = Expression.SymbolDocument(@"Source.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create a new type to hold our Main method Di2015NewLine    TypeBuilder typeBuilder = module.DefineType("HelloWorldType", TypeAttributes.Public | TypeAttributes.Class);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create the Main(string[] args) method Di2015NewLine    MethodBuilder methodbuilder = typeBuilder.DefineMethod("MyMethod", MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.Static | MethodAttributes.Public, typeof(void), new Type[] { typeof(string[]) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a local variable of type 'string', and call it 'xyz'Di2015NewLine    var localXYZ = Expression.Variable(typeof(string), "xyz"); // Provide name for the debugger. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var generator = DebugInfoGenerator.CreatePdbGenerator();Di2015NewLine    var debugInfo1 = Expression.DebugInfo(doc, 2, 1, 2, 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Emit sequence point before the IL instructions. This is start line, start col, end line, end column, Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Line 2: xyz = "hello"; Di2015NewLine    var assign = Expression.Assign(localXYZ, Expression.Constant("Hello world!"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Line 3: Write(xyz); Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo infoWriteLine = typeof(System.Console).GetMethod("WriteLine", new Type[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLine    var debugInfo2 = Expression.DebugInfo(doc, 3, 1, 3, 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var write = Expression.Call(infoWriteLine, localXYZ);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Line 4: return; Di2015NewLine    var debugInfo3 = Expression.DebugInfo(doc, 4, 1, 4, 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var block = Expression.Block(new ParameterExpression[] { localXYZ }, new Expression[] { debugInfo1, assign, debugInfo2, write, debugInfo3 });Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<string[]>>(block, Expression.Parameter(typeof(string[])));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // bake it Di2015NewLine    lambda.CompileToMethod(methodbuilder, generator);Di2015NewLine    Type helloWorldType = typeBuilder.CreateType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This now calls the newly generated method. We can step into this and debug our emitted code!! Di2015NewLine    var dm = (Action<string[]>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<string[]>), helloWorldType.GetMethod("MyMethod"));Di2015NewLine    dm(new string[] { null }); // <-- step into this call Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorCamelCasePropertyNamesContractResolver
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorContractResolver
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum IdentifierCaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Camel,Di2015NewLine    Pascal,Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CustomPropertyNamesContractResolver : DefaultContractResolverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly CultureInfo Culture = CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomPropertyNamesContractResolver (bool shareCache = false)Di2015NewLine        : base(shareCache)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Case = IdentifierCase.Camel;Di2015NewLine        PreserveUnderscores = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IdentifierCase Case { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool PreserveUnderscores { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override string ResolvePropertyName (string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ChangeCase(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string ChangeCase (string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder(s.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool isNextUpper = Case == IdentifierCase.Pascal, isPrevLower = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var c in s) {Di2015NewLine            if (c == '_') {Di2015NewLine                if (PreserveUnderscores)Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                isNextUpper = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(isNextUpper ? char.ToUpper(c, Culture) : isPrevLower ? c : char.ToLower(c, Culture));Di2015NewLine                isNextUpper = false;Di2015NewLine                isPrevLower = char.IsLower(c);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Json.NET implementation for referenceDi2015NewLine    private static string ToCamelCase (string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s) || !char.IsUpper(s[0]))Di2015NewLine            return s;Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < s.Length; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            if (i == 0 || i + 1 >= s.Length || char.IsUpper(s[i + 1]))Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(char.ToLower(s[i], Culture));Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(s.Substring(i));Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorPascalCase
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorcamelCase
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorToCamelCase
18828097Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var obj = new Dictionary<string, string> {Di2015NewLine            { "SessionID", "123456" },Di2015NewLine            { "HTTP_VERB", "POST" },Di2015NewLine            { "HTTPVERSION", "1" },Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        var settings = new JsonSerializerSettings {Di2015NewLine            Formatting = Formatting.Indented,Di2015NewLine            ContractResolver = new CustomPropertyNamesContractResolver()Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        string strCamel = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(obj, settings);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("camelCase: \\n" + strCamel);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(strCamel.Contains("httP_VERB") ? "Something is wrong with this camel case" : "Success");Di2015NewLine        settings.ContractResolver = new CustomPropertyNamesContractResolver {Di2015NewLine            Case = IdentifierCase.Pascal,Di2015NewLine            PreserveUnderscores = false,Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        string strPascal = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(obj, settings);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("PascalCase: \\n" + strPascal);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
